Struct input_parameters_t¶

  • Defined in File input_parameters_t.h

Struct Documentation¶

struct input_parameters_t¶

Structure to collect all input parameters.

Public Functions

input_parameters_t()¶
void set_input_from_arguments(global_args_t &arg)¶

Set values from property tree used in reading checkpoint files. Set the input parameters with the data from the global arguments.

Parameters

  • arg: Stuct with command line arguments.

  • in: Struct where the input parameters will be stored.

void print_parameters()¶

Print all given input parameters.

void to_json(nlohmann::json &j, const double &time) const¶

Public Members

double t_end_prime¶

End simulation time in seconds.

double dt_prime¶

Timestep size in seconds for the simulation.

int32_t start_time_idx¶

Timestep index to start (multiply by dt_traject_prime to get the seconds).

int snapshot_index¶

Save a snapshot every snapshot_index iteration.

uint64_t num_sub_steps¶

Number of timesteps for the simulation between two datapoints from the netCDF file.

std::string OUTPUT_FILENAME¶

Filename for output.

std::string INPUT_FILENAME¶

Filename for input netCDF file.

std::string ENS_CONFIG_FILENAME¶

Filename for ensemble configuration file.

std::string CHECKPOINT_FILENAME¶

Filename for checkpoint file.

std::string FOLDER_NAME¶

Folder name for newly generated checkpoints.

std::string tracking_filename¶

File to switch on specific variables to track.

uint32_t id¶

ID given for this instance, i.e. thread_id or id by GNU parallel.

uint32_t n_ensembles¶
bool start_over_env¶

Start over environment variables at new timestep of trajectory?

bool fixed_iteration¶

Fix temperature and pressure at every iteration?

bool track_initial_cond¶

Track sensitivity to initial coniditions instead of model parameters.

uint32_t auto_type¶

Particle type.

uint32_t traj¶

Trajectory index to load from the netCDF file.

uint32_t write_index¶

Write every x iterations to disk.

uint64_t progress_index¶

Index for updating progressbar.

uint32_t ensemble¶

Index of ensemble.

double current_time¶

Time for and from checkpoint files.

double delay_time_store¶

Seconds for warm-up of the model.

int simulation_mode¶

Simulation mode.
